attributes.action: Refuse to appoint a UK commissioner to the EU if it resists no deal.
attributes.background: The EU is acting like the fitness industry. Gyms like people to pay their membership but not come! (1) The EU wants our £50 million/day. Now we are leaving it is doing all it can to stop it for financial reasons. We can stop this by refusing to appoint a commissioner so it can't operate legally.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Govenrment has already confirmed it does not intended to nominate a Commissioner. In any case, not appointing a Commssioner would not stop the UK from being a member state of the EU. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
